Token.Abstract: The subscription service is used tell ContextHub that you want to be notified when tagged elements are created, updated, and deleted on the server. You must enable push notifications if you want to receive updates from the server. When server changes are made, the device is notified using a background push notification. The subscription service will post notifications to the NSNotificationCenter when changes are detected.
The singleton instance of the CCHSubscriptionService.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The singleton instance of the CCHSubscriptionService.

Token.Abstract: Gets all subscriptions for the current device.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: executed when the request completes. The block is passed an NSDictionary of subscriptions. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Subscribes the device to beacon change notifications for the specified tags.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) Is executed when the request completes. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Unsubscribes the device from beacon change notifications for the specified tags.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) Is executed when the request completes. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Subscribes the device to geofence change notifications for the specified tags.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) Is executed when the request completes. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Unubscribes the device from geofence change notifications for the specified tags.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) Is executed when the request completes. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Subscribes the device to change notifications for the specified tags.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) an NSArray of the elements that you want to subscribe to. (CCHOptionBeacon, CCHOptionGeofence, CCHOptionVault)

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) Is executed when the request completes. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.

Token.Abstract: Unsubscribes the device from change notifications for the specified tags.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) an NSArray of the elements that you want to unsubscribe from. (CCHOptionBeacon, CCHOptionGeofence, CCHOptionVault)

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: (optional) Is executed when the request completes. If an error occurs, the NSError will be passed to the block.
